meanings.definition: The state or quality of being impermanent.
meanings.sent1: The impermanences of life remind us to cherish each moment.
meanings.sent2: She reflected on the impermanences of nature as the seasons changed.
meanings.sent3: The impermanences of the melting ice cream cone made her laugh.
meanings.sent4: Like fleeting clouds in the sky, impermanences drift through our lives.
meanings.sent5: The impermanences of childhood innocence fade with the passage of time.

meanings.sent1: The museum displayed various impermanences from different eras.
meanings.sent2: He collected memories of impermanences to create a collage of life.
meanings.sent3: The impermanences of the soap bubbles entertained the children for hours.
meanings.sent4: In the garden, impermanences bloomed and withered in a beautiful cycle.
meanings.sent5: The impermanences of the sandcastle were washed away by the incoming tide.
